cast.overview: Newly elected President Nelson Mandela knows his nation remains racially and economically divided in the wake of apartheid. Believing he can bring his people together through the universal language of sport, Mandela rallies South Africa's rugby union team as they make their historic run to the 1995 Rugby World Cup Championship match.
cast.title: Invictus

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  

Bonnie Mbuli (also Bonnie Henna) was born in Soweto, South Africa. She attended school at Belgravia Convent and Greenside High School in Johannesburg. Born Bonnie Mbuli, she was discovered at the age of 13, at a bus stop on her way home from school, by an agent who soon got her a job on the television series Viva Families.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Bonnie Henna, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Bonnie Mbuli
